title: Department of Mental Health; establish grant program to assist with crisis stabilization unit expenses.
subject: Appropriations A
Public Health and Human Services

actions.description: Referred To Public Health and Human Services;Appropriations A

extras.summary: AN ACT TO REQUIRE THE DEPARTMENT OF MENTAL HEALTH TO  ESTABLISH A PROGRAM TO MAKE GRANTS TO REGIONAL COMMISSIONS, COUNTIES AND MUNICIPALITIES FOR THE PURPOSE OF ASSISTING IN PAYING COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH SERVICES PROVIDED BY CRISIS STABILIZATION UNITS, EXPENSES OF OPERATING CRISIS STABILIZATION UNIT FACILITIES AND REPAIRING, RENOVATING, UPGRADING AND IMPROVING CRISIS STABILIZATION UNIT FACILITIES; TO CREATE A SPECIAL FUND IN THE STATE TREASURY TO BE DESIGNATED AS THE "CRISIS STABILIZATION UNIT FACILITIES FUND"; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
